# Escape Sequences

## Literal Asterisks

Use \*asterisks\* without italics.

The formula is 5 \* 3 = 15.

Multiple: \*\*not bold\*\* stays plain.

## Literal Underscores

File name: my\_file\_name.txt

Variable: some\_variable\_here

Not italic: \_underscores\_ as text.

## Literal Backticks

Show a backtick: \`

Not code: \`plain text\`

## Literal Brackets

Array syntax: \[0\] and \[1\]

Not a link: \[text\](url)

## Literal Hash

\# Not a header

\## Also not a header

C\# programming language

## Mixed Escapes

Formula: x \* y = z\_result

Code reference: \`variable\_name\` in docs

Array: items\[0\] \* items\[1\]

## Backslash Itself

Path: C:\\Users\\Name

Escaped backslash: \\\\

Multiple: \\\\ and \\\\

## Real World Examples

File path: /home/user/my\_project/

Math: 3 \* 4 + 5 \* 6 = 42

Regex: \[a-z\]\+ matches lowercase
